detail.r2: 2. Every participator will get a number (get 2 numbers if you participant twice)
detail.r3: 3. The game will generate an random number once the pool is filled, and the participator who had the number win the game
detail.r4: 4. The game will trigger a countdown after every participation, if there are NOT any new participation after the countdown run out and the pool is NOT full, the last participator win the game
detail.r5: 5. Restart and a new round of game
detail.r6: 6. Anyone who Start/Restart the game will be rewarded with 0.05EOS; The platform wil claim 10% of total EOS as maintenance fee

participant.remaining_tail: more participators to open the treasure box
